data.text:
Bar staff and the majority of the hostel staff were great! Everyone seemed friendly enough, except for one male employee who lacked customer service skills and seemed like he wasnâ€™t interested in giving us the best stay possible. 
I know the hostel was busy, specially as it is the Easter Holidays, however the condescending and negative attitude made the majority of the group feel unwelcomed and uncomfortable. A situation occurred where this employee gave out free towels to half the group and refused to give towels to the other half - when this misunderstanding was brought up, he implied we were at fault and â€˜trying to stealâ€™. 

Apart from this, the bar prices were great and location was very central around everything we needed such as metro, shops, supermarkets. Breakfast was included in our booking as we were a large group (20+), however timings between 7-8am were an issue and there was also limited options. 
Rooms were spacious and clean, however the door/window was locked from around 6pm onwards until the late morning, so the room never got aired out, making it very hot to sleep in. There is also a light which doesnâ€™t turn off during the night. 

Apart from the slight inconveniences, we all had a good time!
data.title: Nice Room, Great Location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hey Lily!

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We're glad to hear that you found our bar prices great and our location convenient. We apologize for any inconvenience. Regarding the towel situation, sometimes groups pre-book towels, which may lead to misunderstandings when they're distributed. Our colleague may have given them out initially assuming they were part of a pre-booked group, but we do have to charge for them if they're not included in the booking. We want to assure you that we never intended to imply that anyone was stealing. We were simply trying to clarify the situation and manage the allocation of resources fairly. We're sorry if this came across as confrontational. Regarding the timing of breakfast, we have a special time for bigger groups and it is in place to make sure everyone gets a chance to have it. We appreciate your feedback and will take it into account as we strive to improve our services. We're glad to hear that despite these inconveniences, you still had a good time overall. For any additional feedback please get in touch with your agency. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future and provide you with a better experience.
owner_response.author: Ellie Roberts

data.text: I've never been in a hostel before but this place has definitely changed me! Everything is so clean, the beds and pillows are comfy. Reception staff are so helpful and all the tour guides are so lovely! I stayed in the 12 bed all girls room which was fantastic. Would definitely book with their other branches
data.title: I love hostels now

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear that your first hostel experience with us was such a positive one and that we've had the opportunity to change your perception of hostels.

It's fantastic to know that you found everything to be clean and comfortable, and that our reception staff and tour guides were helpful and friendly. We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay in our 12-bed all girls room.

We would be absolutely thrilled to host you again in any of our other branches. Your satisfaction means everything to us, and we can't wait to welcome you back for another fantastic stay!

Warm regards,
owner_response.author: Ellie Roberts

data.text: I was first time in my life at hostel bed in dorm but I travel by train the same type almost. Was clean.  Welcome drink . My roommates were very nice kids from all around the world. Just night time the back from party. Wake me up. And after they slept deep at morning. I keep quite getting ready to go out. It was ok. Who knows maybe use it again.
data.title: Maybe use again

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you for sharing your first hostel experience with us! We're glad to hear that you found the dorm clean and enjoyed the welcome drink. It's wonderful that you had friendly roommates from different parts of the world.
It sounds like overall it was a positive experience, and we're pleased to hear that you're open to the possibility of using hostels again in the future. If you decide to travel this way again, we'd love to welcome you back. If there's anything we can do to improve your experience next time, please let us know. Safe travels! ðŸ˜ŠðŸŒŸ
owner_response.author: Ellie Roberts

data.text:
I only stay in hostels when Iâ€™m traveling solo. This was the worse experience. Ever. Didnâ€™t sleep a wink:
1. The mattress was as firm/soft as florist foam/oasis (not joking). The pillow wasnâ€™t much better. Felt like the pillow was filled with old clothes/sheets.
2. I was very undecided on breakfast, but caved and fell for the hard sell on breakfast. Then I realized I had to leave at 6:30 AM, because I had a 8:00 AM train to catch. However, breakfast didnâ€™t start until 8:00 AM. Staff refused to refund the breakfast fee paid,  even though I was never advised it was non-refundable.
3. The other roommates were clashing and banging (packing) between MIDNIGHT and 2:00 AM.
4. I was surrounded by snorers. 
5. Staff arenâ€™t interested in helping or assisting with tourist-related questions. 
6. Have decided my sleep, and peace of mind are worth more than saving a few dollars on hotels. I cannot, in all honesty, recommended St Christoperâ€™s Inn in Barcelona.
data.title: CANNOT Recommend, Nor Will Stay Here Again

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you for sharing your feedback with us, and we sincerely apologize for the challenges you encountered during your stay. Your comments are invaluable to us as we continuously strive to improve our services.

We're truly sorry to hear that your experience fell short of expectations. Rest assured, we take all feedback seriously, and we're committed to addressing the issues you've raised.

Regarding disturbances in the room, we encourage our guests to report any disruptions to our reception team immediately so that we can take swift action to resolve the situation. We understand the importance of a peaceful environment for a good night's rest and will do our utmost to ensure your comfort.

We're also sorry for the miscommunication regarding breakfast timing and the refund policy. We'll review our procedures to ensure that all guests are properly informed and accommodated, especially those with early departures.

Your comfort and satisfaction are our top priorities, and we regret that we were unable to meet your expectations on this occasion. We truly value your feedback and will use it to make necessary improvements.

Should you reconsider staying with us in the future, we would welcome the opportunity to provide you with a much-improved experience.

Warm regards,
owner_response.author: Ellie Roberts

data.text: All great, other than the bouncer at 20:30 on the 19.02. All staff and bouncers were great but this d**khead shouldnâ€™t be employed.The hostel was clean, easy check in, good food at the bar and would recommend to everyone. Very central in the Barcelona
data.title: Recommend!
